How It Works

Three simple steps to transform screen time from battle to motivation

01

Assign Tasks

Create chores, homework, or activities. Set point values. Add photo proof requirement.

02

Kids Complete

Your child finishes tasks and submits photo proof through the app. No photo, no points.

03

Earn & Redeem

Approve completions, points are awarded automatically. Kids redeem for screen time or rewards.

Features Parents Love

Everything you need to manage screen time without the daily fights

Photo Proof

Kids must submit photo evidence for every task. No more guessing if they actually did it.

Automatic Enforcement

When time runs out, apps lock automatically using iOS Screen Time APIs. No negotiations needed.

Flexible Rewards

Screen time, cash, privileges, or experiences. Customize rewards that motivate YOUR child.

Time Banking

Kids can save up points and redeem when they want. Teaches delayed gratification.

Achievement Badges

Celebrate milestones with visual achievements that keep kids engaged and motivated.

COPPA Compliant

Built with child safety in mind. Your data stays private and secure.
